name: That-a-Way
description:
Avoid enemies, which get quicker and quicker, in a fast-paced simple arcade game.

That-a-Way is a casual, minimalistic indie game where you dodge walls and aim to survive for as long as possible.

Challenge your friends for the best high score!

The game features small haptics when pressing various buttons, which enhance the overall gaming experience.

The game also features no in-App purchases or ads.
